I enjoy using and contributing to open-source scientific software. I've co-developed the following software packages in `R` and `python`.

### __`maars`__

An `R` implementation of the series of papers [@buja2019maapt1] and [@buja2019maapt2] based on a tidy grammar.

### __`iRF`__

A `python` package to implement the iterative Random Forest (`iRF`)
family of algorithms from [@basu2018irfstableinteractions]. This is implementation 
is a joint effort of several people in UC Berkeley. See [here](https://github.com/Yu-Group/iterative-Random-Forest/blob/master/Authors.md) for the complete 
list of developers.
